node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #4946 及 #4958 宗個案患者的家人，無外遊紀錄，9 月 11 日出現喉嚨乾涸，翌日與家人到屯門良田體育館接受全民檢測，其後因為第 #4946 個案患者確診而送去醫院，在急症室期間已獲知悉檢測呈初步陽性。
node.detail_en: The patient is a family member of patients #4946 and #4958, has no recent travel history, and developed a dry throat on Sept 11. On the same day, she was tested in the Universal Community Testing Programme at the testing centre in Leung Tin Sports Centre, Tuen Mun. She was hospitalized when patient #4946 tested positive. When she was in the Accident & Emergency Department, her results came out preliminary positive.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: King Wing House, Shan King Estate
